critique:
Many photos show him either holding a trophy, flexing his biceps, or holding a national flag on the podium, rather than only an image.
Most of the audience are just watching, with only a few people talking.

temporal.caption: An image is shown of a man posing with trophies and flexing his biceps.
The images cut to videos, as he wins multiple arm wrestling matches and trophies.
In the final scenes, a vast audience talks as they watch him win yet again.

captions.full: An image is shown of a man posing with trophies and flexing his biceps. The images cut to videos, as he wins multiple arm wrestling matches and trophies. In the final scenes, a vast audience talks as they watch him win yet again.
